column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=A few months ago , I took a train to Sacramento to visit my friend and her family .
#id=2
#text=I had decided to take the train because Sacramento is 72 miles from the city I live in and I am not a good driver .
#id=3
#text=I ordered the train tickets online a week before my trip and wrote down my confirmation number .
#id=4
#text=When I got to the train station , I went to a small self-service kiosk in the lobby and entered my personal information including my confirmation number , and printed out my train ticket .
#id=5
#text=After that , I walked up to the platform and waited for my train .
#id=6
#text=There were several electronic displays that said when the train would come , and I watched them impatiently .
#id=7
#text=When the train arrived , I boarded behind another passenger and found a window seat so I could enjoy the view .
#id=8
#text=I also liked the seat because it had a table in front of it .
#id=9
#text=I had a backpack with me which I put in the compartment above my seat .
#text=I put my ticket on top of the table so it would be easy to find .
#text=A few minutes later , a worker came by to check passenger 's tickets , and after I showed him and he stamped it , I put my ticket in my pocket .
#text=There were not many people traveling so no one sat near me .
#text=The train departed the station shortly after that .
#text=I fell asleep on the train , but I woke up well before my stop .
#text=When the train stopped at my station , I grabbed my backpack and off boarded onto the platform .
#text=Then I went in to the train station and met my friend who had come to pick me up .
